com.github.robtimus.servlet.http

Class BodyCapturingFilter.BodyCapturingRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
        • com.github.robtimus.servlet.http.InputTransformingHttpServletRequestWrapper
          • com.github.robtimus.servlet.http.BodyCapturingFilter.BodyCapturingRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpServletRequest, ServletRequest
    Enclosing class:
    BodyCapturingFilter

    protected final class BodyCapturingFilter.BodyCapturingRequest
extends InputTransformingHttpServletRequestWrapper
    An HttpServletRequest wrapper that captures the request's body as it's read.
    Author:
    Rob Spoor

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest

        BASIC_AUTH, CLIENT_CERT_AUTH, DIGEST_AUTH, FORM_AUTH

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean bodyIsConsumed()
      Returns whether or not the request body has been fully consumed.
      byte[] capturedBinaryBody()
      Returns the captured binary body.
      String capturedBinaryBodyAsString()
      Returns the captured binary body as a string.
      String capturedTextBody()
      Returns the captured text body.
      BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode captureMode()
      Returns the capture mode: BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.BYTES if ServletRequest.getInputStream() was used. BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.TEXT if ServletRequest.getReader() was used. BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.NONE if neither method was used.
      long totalBodySize()
      Returns the total body size, as far as the body has already been read.
      protected Reader transform(BufferedReader reader)
      Transforms the original BufferedReader.
      protected InputStream transform(ServletInputStream inputStream)
      Transforms the original ServletInputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        protected InputStream transform(ServletInputStream inputStream)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from class: InputTransformingHttpServletRequestWrapper
        Transforms the original ServletInputStream.

        This default implementation returns the unmodified argument.

        Overrides:
        transform in class InputTransformingHttpServletRequestWrapper
        Parameters:
        inputStream - The original ServletInputStream to transform.
        Returns:
        An InputStream that is the result of transforming the given ServletInputStream. It does not necessary have to be a ServletInputStream.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurred during the transformation.

      • transform

        protected Reader transform(BufferedReader reader)
                    throws IOException
        Description copied from class: InputTransformingHttpServletRequestWrapper
        Transforms the original BufferedReader.

        This default implementation returns the unmodified argument.

        Overrides:
        transform in class InputTransformingHttpServletRequestWrapper
        Parameters:
        reader - The original BufferedReader to transform.
        Returns:
        A Reader that is the result of transforming the given BufferedReader. It does not necessary have to be a BufferedReader.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurred during the transformation.

      • captureMode

        public BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode captureMode()
        Returns the capture mode:
        • BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.BYTES if ServletRequest.getInputStream() was used.
        • BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.TEXT if ServletRequest.getReader() was used.
        • BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode.NONE if neither method was used.
        Returns:
        The capture mode.

      • capturedBinaryBody

        public byte[] capturedBinaryBody()
        Returns the captured binary body.
        Returns:
        A byte array with the captured binary body.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the body has not been captured as bytes.
        See Also:
        captureMode()

      • capturedBinaryBodyAsString

        public String capturedBinaryBodyAsString()
        Returns the captured binary body as a string. This method will use the request's character encoding if available; otherwise the ServletContext's request character encoding if available; otherwise StandardCharsets.UTF_8.
        Returns:
        The captured binary body as a string.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the body has not been captured as bytes.
        See Also:
        captureMode()

      • capturedTextBody

        public String capturedTextBody()
        Returns the captured text body.
        Returns:
        The captured text body.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the body has not been captured as text.
        See Also:
        captureMode()

      • totalBodySize

        public long totalBodySize()
        Returns the total body size, as far as the body has already been read. This can be a number of bytes or characters, depending on the capture mode.
        Returns:
        The total body size.

      • bodyIsConsumed

        public boolean bodyIsConsumed()
        Returns whether or not the request body has been fully consumed. This will be the case if one of the read methods of either the input stream or the reader returns -1.
        Returns:
        true if the request body has been fully consumed, or false otherwise.
